thread.title: Democratic debate host Steve Wynn more of a Republican
thread.title_full: Democratic debate host Steve Wynn more of a Republican

title: Democratic debate host Steve Wynn more of a Republican
text:
Democratic debate host Steve Wynn more of a Republican Tools 
  12:00 PM   12:00 PM EDT 
LAS VEGAS (AP) â€” Casino mogul Steve Wynn is hosting the Tuesday night Democratic presidential debate at his Wynn Las Vegas resort-casino. 
And while he dined with the Clintons socially earlier this year, he is no fan of President Barack Obama. He abhors the federal health law, has offered advice to Republican presidential candidates and has personally supported the GOP's candidates and political action committees in the past. 
So how did Wynn become host to the first Democratic presidential debate? CNN made the call, reaching out to the resort-casino company's government relations chief. 
Wynn says hosting the debate is a point of pride for the company. He expects 250 employees to be in the crowd.
